vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.7.1;
son of: Carmi (H3756H)
Also named: a.khar (עָכָר "Achan" H5917)
§ Achan = "troubler"
a Judaite who violated God's specific ban on taking any loot from the captured city of Jericho and was stoned to death along with his family for this violation
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Carmí; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞干 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "惹麻煩者"
一猶大人違反神特別在從戰勝耶利哥城中取走戰利品之禁令,
而且和他的家人為著這違背禁令而被石頭打死
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚干 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "惹麻烦者"
一犹大人违反神特别在从战胜耶利哥城中取走战利品之禁令,
而且和他的家人为着这违背禁令而被石头打死
